channel.title: Bluefeeds RSS Page
channel.description: This is the news page for the Bluefeeds web app.

item.title: Ingredients of Successful Medical Student Teaching
item.description: Tolstoy begins his great novel Anna Karenina with the statement that all happy families are alike, but each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

item.title: Opportunities for teaching medical students in Primary Care
item.description: The primary care course for medical students at Cambridge University is coordinated by the GP Education Group (GPEG), part of the Cambridge University Department of Public Health and Primary Care.

item.title: Teaching Medical Students About Costs
item.description: After graduating from college I had the opportunity to spend two years working at the Institute of Medicine on a variety of health care improvement topics.

item.title: A General Approach to Teaching Medical Students Ophthalmology
item.description: In recent years, medical students across the country have had a deficit of knowledge in ophthalmology. This has been due to many factors, but principally to a lack of formalized education and clinical exposure during medical school.
